AUBG 2008 Yearbook

May 12th 2008

Doing the design and layout of the yearbook for the American University in Bulgaria was real pleasure and honor, especially when I was one of the graduating students.

This project was a serious and tedious task since the yearbook was 74 pages, but it was also one of the most rewarding projects I have done. What you see here is the yearbook cover. It is a collage containing different elements and symbols that will always remind the graduates of the most exciting four years of their lives. Not all symbols are so obviousâ€¦for some of them you need to look closer! :)
